app.title: Arabic Kids • Shibl
app.tagline: Playful Arabic practice with a non-verbal companion
app.subheading: Short, guided activities keep learners focused. Shibl reacts with simple animations only—no chat, no accounts, and all progress stays on this device.

lesson.safetyNote: Shibl reacts visually to lesson events only. No chat or free text is collected.

feedback.lessonComplete: Lesson complete! Get ready for the next step.

lesson.completedStatus: You finished this lesson. Continue when you’re ready.

level.startCopy: Begin with simple letter recognition, then move to words, first reading, and a celebratory review. No account is needed.
level.completedStatus: Level completed! You can replay lessons anytime.
level.completedBody: Great work. You recognized letters, read short words, and finished a celebratory review. Shibl is celebrating with you.

auth.parentLoginDesc: Parents sign in here. Children keep learning without typing passwords.
auth.parentRegisterDesc: Create a parent-only account to manage access. Children never need credentials.
auth.emailAlreadyUsed: This email already has an account.
auth.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 8 characters.
auth.passwordTooLong: Password must be 72 characters or fewer.
auth.loggingOut: Signing you out of your parent session...

account.placeholder: Parents manage access here. Children keep playing lessons without logging in.
account.dataNotice: Progress stays on this device. Only your email and hashed password are stored for parent sign-in.
account.noProgress: Progress will appear after your child starts Level 1.
